7:"$Sreact.suspense"
3:T8bd,<h1 class="text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4 mt-8">üê¨ Deploy MySQL as Container</h1>

MySQL is the world's most popular open source database. Running it in Docker makes deployment and scaling straightforward.
<h2 class="text-2xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-3 mt-8">Quick Start</h2>

<pre class="overflow-x-auto rounded-lg bg-gray-900 p-4 mb-4 border border-gray-700"><code class="text-sm font-mono text-gray-300">docker run -d \
  --name mysql \
  -e MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=secretpassword \
  -e MYSQL_DATABASE=myapp \
  -p 3306:3306 \
  -v mysql_data:/var/lib/mysql \
  mysql:8.0
</code></pre>
<h2 class="text-2xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-3 mt-8">Docker Compose</h2>

<pre class="overflow-x-auto rounded-lg bg-gray-900 p-4 mb-4 border border-gray-700"><code class="text-sm font-mono text-gray-300">version: '3.8'
services:
  mysql:
    image: mysql:8.0
    container_name: mysql
    environment:
      MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD: ${MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD}
      MYSQL_DATABASE: ${MYSQL_DATABASE}
      MYSQL_USER: ${MYSQL_USER}
      MYSQL_PASSWORD: ${MYSQL_PASSWORD}
    ports:
<li class="ml-4 text-gray-700">"3306:3306"</li>
    volumes:
<li class="ml-4 text-gray-700">mysql_data:/var/lib/mysql</li>
<li class="ml-4 text-gray-700">./init.sql:/docker-entrypoint-initdb.d/init.sql</li>
    restart: unless-stopped

volumes:
  mysql_data:
</code></pre>
<h2 class="text-2xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-3 mt-8">Environment Variables</h2>

| Variable | Description |
|----------|-------------|
| <code class="px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded bg-gray-100 text-gray-800 text-sm font-mono">MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD</code> | Root password (required) |
| <code class="px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded bg-gray-100 text-gray-800 text-sm font-mono">MYSQL_DATABASE</code> | Database to create |
| <code class="px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded bg-gray-100 text-gray-800 text-sm font-mono">MYSQL_USER</code> | Additional user |
| <code class="px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded bg-gray-100 text-gray-800 text-sm font-mono">MYSQL_PASSWORD</code> | Password for additional user |
<h2 class="text-2xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-3 mt-8">See Also</h2>
<li class="ml-4 text-gray-700"><a href="/docs/mysql/backup-restore" class="text-blue-600 hover:text-blue-700 underline">Backup & Restore</a></li>
